Description: Rectangular limestone stela divided into two registers with similar scenes of seated male figures with a standing female behind and piled offerings in front; two lines of Hieroglyphic text above each scene.
Curator's comments: Published: PM V: p. 96. HTBM 3: Plate 36. Freed, R E, 1996, in Fs. Simpson, p. 328.
Condition: good - single gouge on the left-hand side
